actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shimmer seal makes two tusk attacks.

actions.name: Tusk
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Limited Invisibility
special_abilities.desc: When the shimmer seal is on an icy surface or underwater, it is invisible. In all other terrain, the shimmer seal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. Seals, other pinnipeds, and creatures chosen by the shimmer seal can see it.

special_abilities.name: Sureflippered
special_abilities.desc: The shimmer seal can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.

special_abilities.name: Underwater Propulsion
special_abilities.desc: When the shimmer seal is underwater, it can take the Dash action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
